sentences.sContent: Not all schools manage to successfully inculcate a love of learning.
sentences.sCn: 不是所有的学校都能培养出学生爱学习的热情。

synos.tran: 教育；谆谆教诲；教授；反覆灌输

remMethod.val: in(进入) + culc(踩踏) + ate → 为进入某人内心而踩踏 → 谆谆教诲， 反复灌输

trans.tranCn: 谆谆教诲， 反复灌输
trans.tranOther: to fix ideas, principles etc in someone’s mind
